channel.title: Erudus ~ New Server ~ Try Now!
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://puu.sh/bORfv/1b92f77742.jpg[/img]
[img]http://puu.sh/bORHa/4d14615539.jpg[/img]
[url=http://www.dropbox.com/s/n3ne79x9npq9d0t/ErudusV1.1.jar]Download Client Here!![/url]
Server is under development, so please, be patient, it was decided, to release it for now cause some players was requesting this to be released and to play with some more players. This is a 317 ECO server. Some customs are added. Some will be available from drops, some from Vote Point Shops - Some from Donator Shops. Give the server a try.
[i]Server's Features: -317 Eco Server-No dupes- No Spawning -No GoodieBag Event or Drop Parties -Nice Shops -Perfect Clan Chat System -Money Pouch -Infinity Money -Exchange Coins For 1B Check Options -450+ Customs -Customs NPC -Castle Wars Minigame -Nice Training Zones -Nice Home
Last Updates Server Side: -Added 99 Level Announcements -Added Login Messages -New training Zones -Customs NPCS -New Home -New Shops -Added Infinity Money System 1B Check Must See Ingame -Added ::commands[/i]
[i]Coming Soon Features: -Highscore -Auto-Vote -More Custom Zones -Fullscreen -More Shops -All Skilling will be at Home[/i]
[i]Website : http://www.erudus.hostei.com [u]Webclient Available on the website[/u][/i]
[u][i][b]Teleports[/b][/i][/u]
[i][b]Monsters Training[/b][/i] [img]http://puu.sh/bOQVJ/64e66159a6.jpg[/img]
[i][b]Minigames[/b][/i] [img]http://puu.sh/bOTkl/dbf426ec17.jpg[/img]
[i][b]Regular Bosses Training[/b][/i] [img]http://puu.sh/bOQYo/46afbf450c.jpg[/img]
[i][b]Player Killing[/b][/i] [img]http://puu.sh/bOQZQ/0e6e824f32.jpg[/img]
[i][b]Skilling[/b][/i] [img]http://puu.sh/bOR11/98a2f542b8.jpg[/img]
[b][i]Commands[/i][/b] [img]http://puu.sh/bOR6l/3234fe00a2.jpg[/img]
[b] [i][u]Custom Bosses[/u][/i][/b]
[b]Homer Simpson[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/bORSI/716a0d421f.jpg[/img]
[b]Megaman[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/bORVD/f55450fe08.jpg[/img]
[b]Spongebob[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/bOS4T/5dbd65e54d.jpg[/img]
[b]Penguins[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/bOS8p/57e47cd94e.jpg[/img]
[b]Luigi[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/bOScL/4592d310fc.jpg[/img]
[b]Donkey Kong[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/bOSfD/54ba7ffe53.png[/img]
[b]Pikachu[/b] [img]http://puu.sh/bOSm6/844b91dbac.jpg[/img]
[i]All custom monsters drop custom items. Some are rare, and some aren't. More and more customs are being added, so please be patient.[/i][/CENTER]

[CENTER]

Download Client Here!!

Server is under development, so please, be patient, it was decided, to release it for now cause some players was requesting this to be released and to play with some more players.
This is a 317 ECO server. Some customs are added. Some will be available from drops, some from Vote Point Shops - Some from Donator Shops.
